author: Jenna Portnoy, Fenit Nirappil
title: D.C. was intentionally classified as a territory in virus-aid bill, lawmakers say - The Washington Post
description: D.C. was intentionally classified as a territory in virus-aid bill, lawmakers say The Washington Post DC's mayor says amount of funds allocated for coronavirus is 'infuriating' CNN View Full Coverage on Google News
content: I was enraged by the fact that the District of Columbia was going to be shortchanged, Van Hollen said in an interview. I immediately talked to Senator [Charles E.] Schumer about it and was told that the Republicans had insisted on the formula the way it was i… [+4687 chars]
